data.name: Lasertag Legends
data.description:
Lasertag Legends is a multiplayer lasertag game.

The action takes place in a colorful, neon lit lasertag arena sometime in the near future.

Choose a team, get in the arena and start fragging! 

Each frag helps push your team up the league table. 

At the end of the season, one team will be crowned champions of the Royal Lasertag League.

Lasertag Legends features 3 main modes:

Multiplayer Modes:
- The Main Stage: Battle it out against other players in the Lasertag Legends Arena 

- The Cube: Practice your aim by battling against other players in a small map

Singleplayer Mode: 
- Dino Hunt: Survive against a vicious hoard of holographic dinosaurs 

Need a break? Head to the lobby to hang out, watch a concert, change your tagger or check out your stats.

The game places a focus on teams instead of individual stats. Choose from one of 20 lasertag teams. Once you choose a team, all your frags contribute to your team's overall score. In the lobby, you can see the league table and where each team stands. At the end of the season, one team will be crowned champions.

See you in the arena.
